description: This file contains unit tests for the PaletteGenerator class in the org.example.app package. It tests the generation of color palettes with specific characteristics, such as the default size and variable sizes, and verifies that generated colors are within valid HSL ranges and are distinct.

classes.name: PaletteGeneratorTest
classes.description: A test class containing multiple unit tests for the PaletteGenerator class functions related to color palette creation.

methods.name: generatesFiveDistinctColorsByDefault
methods.description: Tests that the default palette generated contains exactly five distinct colors and that all colors are within valid HSL ranges.

methods.name: supportsVariableSize
methods.description: Verifies that the PaletteGenerator can generate a palette of a specified size and that all colors are valid and distinct.

methods.name: assertAllDistinct
methods.description: Checks that all colors in a palette are unique based on rounded HSL values to account for floating point precision.

methods.name: assertAllInRanges
methods.description: Confirms that all HSL color components in the palette are within their specified valid ranges.
